thread.title: Great service
thread.title_full: Great service - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew B
title: Great service
text:
Needed a room after missing the last train out. Vincent was running the desk and went out of his way to get us a good room at a great price. Very professional and attentive. We had tried to get rooms at the Hilton across the street but front desk employment was a piece of work. Thanks to this experience, I will focus my hotel stays at Marriott/SPG. (Gold member with both Hilton and Marriott/SPG)
Room Tip: Lower floors may have some street noise See more room tips
